resources.string: Tap to change shirt color between red and blue!
Tap to change jacket color between red and blue!
Tap to change hat color between red and blue!
Tap to change pants color between red and blue!
Tap to change shoe color between red and blue!

Have you ever been at a loss on how to dress? How to style yourself perfectly to tackle your day? Or do you just want to have fun and put on some wacky outfits. This app helps you visualize exactly what that would look like. Try it out. You could end up looking good like these people below.
You are ready to rock this! Don\'t forget to tell your friends about this app as well so that they too can try some awesome outfits!
